name: Home Breaker
description:
But sometimes, it also means discord, annoyance and conflict because not everyone can live with each other...
Especially when Timmy feels deeply convinced that everything would be better if his parents broke up. Who wouldn't want twice as much Christmas presents ? Or avoid going to their grand parent's place for the week end ?

In Home Breaker, you play as Timmy and you do everything you can to break the marriage of your parents.
